section.title: Source contexts for charging
section.p: Source contexts provide input attributes to the rule engine for evaluation of criteria.
The section describes the source contexts for charging.
section.note: The dictionary only supports attributes for the PS-Information AVP at this time. Any of the PS-Information attributes can be selected in the rules editor by source context.

row.entry: GyCCR

This context provides the NCC rule engine with access to AVPs. This context is used to report the credit control service information received for Gy, VoLTE, SMS, and MMS requests. It is for use in rules.
CALL_COMMON
This context provides the NCC rule engine with access to attributes used in triggers evaluated by rating or call control module for any call.
GLOBAL
This context provides the global-level checks on attributes.
GY_MESSAGE
This context contains command level Gy message attributes.
SERVICE_INFO
This context provides the NCC rule engine with access to call sub-type information.
SPR_DEVICE
This context provides device specific details to the NCC rule engine.
SUBSCRIPTION
This context provides subscription specific details to the NCC rule engine.
SY_COUNTER
This context provides the NCC rule engine with access to the policy counter status information from the existing Sy session and from rating evaluation.
SY_COUNTER_EVAL
This context evaluates the current policy counter status against the previous status. Using this context, the NCC rule engine can determine whether the policy counter status has changed or not.
SY_MESSAGE
This context provides the NCC rule engine with access to data from an incoming Sy SLR message.
THRESHOLD_PROFILE
This context provides the NCC rule engine with access to threshold specific information.
SPR_GROUP
This context contains the group information.
GY_POST_PROCESSING
This context contains all the context information, such as Call Common context, SPR Device context required at Gy post-processing.
RATING_POST_PROCESSING
This context contains the context information required for rating post processing such as call common context, SPR device, subscription, threshold.
RESOURCE_POST_PROCESSING
This context is evaluated on COMMIT of every resource, such as bucket, counter, main account balance, and NoCharge.
IMS_SERVICE_INFO
This context contains context information for IMS calls.
NCHF_CHARGING_MESSAGE
This context is used for 5G calls.
BUNDLE
This context is used for BOU type of bundles.
SNR_MANAGEMENT
Used in SNR_MANAGEMENT trigger to send notification parameters, used in TCP/IP notifications sent from NS.
SNA_MANAGEMENT
Used in SNA_MANAGEMENT trigger to send notification parameters, used in TCP/IP notifications sent from NS.
